prompt:
Answer this question.

		Question: Did the first Mass Effect game come out before the first Dragon Age game?
		Answer:
answer:
The answer to this question is: No. The statement "Did the first Mass Effect game come out before the first Dragon Age game" is incorrect. 

The first game in the Dragon Age series, Dragon Age: Origins, was released in 2009 and the first game in the Mass Effect series, Mass Effect, was released in 2007.
kaping_triples: (Origins, followed by, Dragon Age II), (Mass Effect, followed by, Mass Effect 2), (Mass Effect franchise, has part, Mass Effect 2), (Mass Effect: Andromeda, part of the series, predecessors), (Mass Effect 3, part of the series, controversy surrounded its release), (original trilogy, has part, Mass Effect 3), (Dragon Age, developer, BioWare), (Dragon Age, developer, Bioware), (controversy surrounded its release, has part, Mass Effect 3), (Mass Effect media franchise, publisher, BioWare)
question: Did the first Mass Effect game come out before the first Dragon Age game?
